$1800, I can provide two 4-week intensive prose workshops, two 1-day intensives, and one week-long intensive retreat-style workshop for up to 34 queer and trans* writers of color.
$2300, I can provide three 4-week intensive prose workshops, three one-day intensives, and one week-long intensive retreat-style workshop for up to 46 queer and trans* writers of color.
$3500, I can provide four 4-week intensive prose workshops, five 1-day intensives, and one week-long intensive retreat-style workshop for up to 64 queer and trans* writers of color.
$4000, I can provide five 4-week intensive prose workshops, one week-long retreat-style workshop, and six monthly 1-day workshops for up to 76 queer and trans* writers of color.
What do you get in exchange? The warm, fuzzy feeling that comes with knowing that you have made it possible for queer, trans*, and gender-non-conforming writers of color to build community, elevate their craft, and get their stories out into the world! And perks such as:

love
appreciation
special thanks on the bgd website
video thanks from the writers you are supporting
poetry written in your honor



The Impact
Every dollar contributed goes to support queer, trans*, and gender-non-conforming writers of color in producing literary work. There is so much great literary talent in our community. Having a support structure to begin and complete writing projects means that many more of our stories get to be told.


Other Ways You Can Help
Even $10 will help, but if you can't make a monetary contribution, please help the workshop by spreading the word! Post the link to this campaign on your Facebook page and your blog, and tell everyone you know! And be sure to leave a comment in the comment section, telling folks why radical writing workshops for queer and trans writers of color are important!
Thanks!

story:
Story of my book

Beyond the Words: How to Get Over Your Fear of Public Speaking and Confidently Present Yourself to the World is about re-defining public speaking. I want us to move from seeing public speaking as a huge, unattainable, fear-inducing beast to an attainable, exhilarating, enriching opportunity for growth.

My name is Taylor Williams and I am the author of Beyond the Words. I wrote this book because the fear of public speaking is crippling for so many people. I have a passion for helping people find their voice and confidence in public speaking, and I know first hand how tough it can be!

I see public speaking as an opportunity for inner growth and connection with others - not as an invitation for embarrassment and failure. We're taught to believe that public speaking is scary and we should be afraid of it. My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that you can become a more confident public speaker, in whatever form that takes for you.

In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for all the various ways we can present ourselves to the world. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you gain confidence in all realms of public speaking: both for self-reflection and connecting to other human beings. I want us to learn how to laugh at ourselves a little along the way, too.

In this book, you'll learn about the reasons we're so terrified of public speaking and presentation, and what the antidotes to those fears are. You'll hear stories such as...

  • How my friend and retired minister, Daniel, clumsily found his voice from the pulpit after someone in the congregation called him a phony.
  • How my experience as a (epically) failed athlete and model led me to improv comedy, which gave me the space to mess up, laugh at myself more, and judge myself less in high-stakes situations.
  • Why Surgeon General Dr. Vivek Murthy deemed loneliness a national epidemic, and why public speaking can help as a means of authentic connection.
  • How my friend and journalist, Katie, uses vulnerability to tell her own stories and draw out stories from others.
  • How famed writer, speaker, and researcher Brene Brown dealt with her first TED talk going viral, when a lot of the comments on social media attacked her physical appearance.


You will love this book if you seek to gain confidence in public speaking, if you want to take your presentations to the next level, or if you seek to understand your fear around being yourself in social situations. 

Beyond the Words is a nonfiction book that speaks to aspiring public speakers and those of us who fear being on the spot, who want to look at public speaking and the ways we present ourselves to the world in a new way.

The Book


The book is written in 3 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-5. This section of the book is about understanding our intense fears surrounding public speaking. We'll look at the role of fear in our lives and biological motivations for wanting to protect ourselves. We'll discuss how Imposter Syndrome and Expert Status Backfire work against our success. And then we'll work to broaden our view of what public speaking is and can be. You'll read stories from folks I interviewed that will normalize your weeping and gnashing of teeth when you think about public speaking. (You're not alone!)

Part 2 contains chapters 6-14. We'll break down the common fears around public speaking (i.e., experiencing hives or jitters before speaking or having to improvise and think on the spot) - and then we'll talk about how to work on them (i.e., building awesome routines and habits that ensure your confidence, or walking away from obsessing over writing a talk.) This is the section where we get into creating a more fruitful and fertile environment to improve our skills and confidence as public speakers. You'll read stories about my awesomely epic failures in being a performer. (Get excited!)

And lastly, Part 3 contains chapters 15-19. This section is about how we can use listening to be better speakers. We'll see how our attention and connection to others helps us gain skills to present ourselves more boldly. We'll talk about how empathy serves as a super power to understand motivations, values, feelings, and emotions - as a means to powerful communication. You'll read stories from stand-up comedians, ministers, journalists, and students about how they connect to others and as a result, flourish themselves. (Let's do this!)

I'm so excited for you to jump in. Gosh, thanks for being here!
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August of 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book. I'm grateful for you!
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

Let's have fun doing this together.

 

About the Author

Taylor Williams is an avid speaker, performer, workshop facilitator, and presenter. She's an adjunct professor at the University of Florida, both in the College of Journalism and the Innovation Academy. She's the Creative Director of Guts & Glory GNV, a live storytelling organization and the Lead Facilitator for Guts & Glory Creative Consulting, a communications consulting firm.

Taylor wrote this book because she loves to see people find their voice and confidence within the things they love to do. Through her work, she also saw how TERRIFIED people are of public speaking, so oftentimes finding a voice and confidence is brutal work. This book is a tool to help.

Taylor has spent a lifetime figuring out why presenting ourselves to the world is such a seemingly untamable beast. She was a goofy, clumsy kid with huge hands and feet who often got made fun of - but was largely blissfully unaware. She was a college athlete, only to have a career-ending injury that changed her identity and led her into wanting to help others reclaim their voice. She spent a few years as an awkward, fumbling comedian and terribly failed model in New York City, which still sounds fancier than it was. And now, she's a semi-confident mom of two kids who she is absolutely wild about. She watches with awe as they figure out how to navigate their own worlds, sometimes while working out barefoot in the driveway. 

For more information, you can connect with Taylor at gutsandglorygnv@gmail.com, or via Facebook, LinkedIn, and on Instagram @gutsanglorygnv.

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #beyondthewordsbook and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support! It's incredible to be on this journey with you.

Thanks again,
Taylor

story:
Think of it like 911, but it's going to be a national text hotline.

1. Support by text for teens in crisis, including counseling and referrals to partner orgs that focus on mental health, suicide, bullying, dating violence, eating disorders, rape, etc to make sure we provide best-in-class support to teens. 

2. Leverage the data to impact communities, policy, academia, etc. (Of course, the privacy and security of the teens is our top priority.) The anonymized data can help tell clear stories about these often silent issues.

 

My name is Anastasia Goodstein and I have been creating media by, for, with and about teenagers for the past 15+ years. When I published my book, Totally Wired: What teens and tweens are really doing online back in 2007, I realized that the internet and mobile were enabling teens to express way more emotionally than they ever would in person. Sometimes the responses might be supportive, other times self disclosure could lead to bullying online or off. What was missing was the connection with support and resources in the moment when a teen might be in pain and needing help the most. After launching and running the youth culture site Ypulse.com for several years, I decided I wanted to focus on how I could address this issue full time. I spent the last two years working at ReachOut.com, an amazing non-profit youth mental health resourced, where I heard about Nancy Lublin's TED talk. I knew I had to get involved.

Quite simply, the Crisis Text line will use text messaging to connect teens with support and resources. We want to create a national (and ultimately international) infrastructure to ensure that teens can use SMS to get help 24/7. I have spent most of my career in the teen space in large part because my own teen years were especially challenging. Talking to my peers and writing in my journal only helped so much. I am passionate about the possibility of launching a service that could potentially help millions of teens through the immediacy, privacy and intimacy of texting.

By donating to this project, you will help that teen who is being bullied and feels they have no where to go. You will help the teen who is being sexually abused at home or the teen who has struggled with depression and is feeling suicidal. Your dollars could literally save lives.

We'd like to raise $15K to help fund the customization of our mobile platform so that we can connect with crisis lines across the country to answer the texts that come in.

Anyone who donates $5K will receive 2 tickets to the Do Something Awards Ceremony on August 19 in Los Angeles (airfare not included).

We also have DoSomething Tees for anyone who donates $50 (modeled by our Crisis Text Line summer intern Lindsey).

Any funds we raise will be applied towards getting this important project off the ground. Your donation to the Crisis Text Line is tax deductible under the fiscal sponsorship of DoSomething.org, a 501c3 charitable organization.

Part of the reason I signed on to help Nancy is that she has a proven track record with both Dress For Success (which she founded) and Do Something, which she has grown into the largest youth organization in the U.S.
 
Read more about DoSomething.org below:
 
This 4 out of 4 star charity runs national campaigns impacting causes teens care about. For example, Teens for Jeans collected more than 1mil pairs of jeans for homeless youth. Give a Spit registered 15,000 new donors for the bone marrow registry--and has already saved 8 lives!
 
Last year, DoSomething.org started using text messaging to market these campaigns. They text over 250,000 teens a week. And have found texting to be 11x more effective than email.
 
DoSomething.org has the technological ability and experience to help launch the Crisis Text Line.
 
Read more about Nancy below:
 
Since August 2003, CEO and Chief Old Person Nancy Lublin of Do Something. She turned the organization from a debt-ridden, “old school” not-for-profit with offices in multiple cities nationwide, to a fast-moving tech-based .org with 2.4 million teens participating in campaigns in 2011.

Nancy says her first activist campaign was liberating the purple crayons in pre-school after one loud boy had declared them “not allowed for girls.”
 
Although she is now a reluctant, Converse-wearing “Old Person,” she gets it because, well, she did it. Armed with a $5,000 inheritance from her immigrant great grandfather at the age of 23, Nancy founded the organization Dress for Success, which to this day provides women with interview suits, career development training, and boosts in their self-confidence in more than 120 cities in ten countries.

Nancy graduated from Brown University, Oxford University (where she was a Marshall Scholar), and New York University School of Law. She is married Jason Diaz and they have two kids who like water parks, ice cream, and broccolli (but not at all once).

Even if you can't contribute cash, you can definitely help us get the word out to others about this campaign (use the share tools!), and just send us your ideas. Find out more at our website - http://crisistextline.org/help-make-it-happen/.

story:
Send me to the Feminist Porn Con!

 Hi, my name is Bianca Stone. I'm a student, sex worker, writer, speaker, and community organizer with the Bay Area chapter of the Sex Workers’ Outreach Project (SWOP Bay).

SWOP bay is a national social justice network dedicated to the fundamental human rights of sex workers and their communities. We focus on ending violence and stigma through education and advocacy.

I was invited to speak at this year's first Feminist Porn Conference organized by feminist pornographer and sex educator Tristan Taormino. The panel I will be speaking on is facilitated by queer & feminist pornographer Tina Horn and titled, “Being Out Now: how do porn performers navigate the current socio-political landscape of sexual morality and media representation?”

I'm excited to converge with international feminist pornographers, performers, and sex workers and continue to build momentum for changing our industry, ending stigma, and redefining culture.

Please consider making a donation to my campaign to help fund my trip.


What I Need & What you get
As a full time student, I work to make my monthly expenses. My fundraising goal is $800 which will pay for my travel costs to make the conference in Toronto.

As a sex worker and performer, I get requests to sell my panties, nylons, autographed photos, and spend time on web-cam with fans. This IndieGogo campaign is a more intentional plan of selling services I already provide in order to raise funds in time for my trip. 

The Impact

Funding my IndieGogo is just one example of how you can support the growing genre of feminist pornography and sex workers making art and redefining culture.

There are many queer-feminist folks who need support getting to the Conference! I am just one of these many folks making my way to the Con to participate.

I plan to write about my trip, and share all that I learned at the conference so those who were unable to attend can stay in connection with what we are doing!

There are many ways to support feminist, queer, and sex worker produced pornography, art, and culture. The Statement of Purpose below was originally posted by Queer Fat Femme on their blog (QueerFatFemme.tumblr.com).

"As diy punks, we value community, and believe that the relationships cultivated by art and work and shared vision contribute to rich creative experience and higher quality production.

As poltically-minded artists, we believe in using sexually explicit media as a platform for documenting and archiving the sexual expression of the disenfranchised (ie those who don’t see their bodies, gender, desires, lifestyle, or erotic pastimes represented in culture or media)

As feminists, we believe that our work is essentially revolutionary because the female queer gaze is a radical tool to exploit the pornographic medium

As queers, we believe in reinforcing an open definition of Queer as an all-inclusive, empowering identity for EVERY HUMAN."

 

 

thank you for taking the time to read my campaign.

in solidarity,

Bianca Stone

San Francisco, March 1st 2013

There are many queer-feminist folks who need support getting to the Conference! I am just one of these many folks making my way to the Con to participate. I plan to write about my trip, and share all that I learned at the conference so those who were unable to attend can stay in connection with what we are doing! There are many ways to support feminist, queer, and sex worker produced pornography, art, and culture. The Statement of Purpose below was originally posted by Queer Fat Femme on their blog (QueerFatFemme.tumblr.com)."As diy punks, we value community, and believe that the relationships cultivated by art and work and shared vision contribute to rich creative experience and higher quality production.
As poltically-minded artists, we believe in using sexually explicit media as a platform for documenting and archiving the sexual expression of the disenfranchised (ie those who don’t see their bodies, gender, desires, lifestyle, or erotic pastimes represented in culture or media)
As feminists, we believe that our work is essentially revolutionary because the female queer gaze is a radical tool to exploit the pornographic medium
As queers, we believe in reinforcing an open definition of Queer as an all-inclusive, empowering identity for EVERY HUMAN."
 
 
thank you for taking the time to read my campaign. in solidarity,
Bianca Stone
San Francisco, March 1st 2013

story:
I’ve been cocooned for many months writing my memoir. The venture began over a decade ago when I first put it out into the ether that I wanted to (read: had to) write a pentagonia (five part series) of memoirs. I had to share the story of this girl, raised in Bushwick by two moms long before the lifestyle was discussed in the mainstream, other than to curl lips in disgust and rail about how the unnaturalness of the homosexual lifestyle. I had to share how it felt to be raised by a mentally ill parent. I had to share the story of how and why I left my mother’s home when I was thirteen and never returned. I had to share what happened to me in boarding school, when I realized that I was “the other,” the time a lit cigarette was thrown from a passing truck at me and my St. Lucian friend, followed by the words, “Nigg*s, go home.” I had to share how I ended up with a drug dealer for six years while a student at Columbia University, and how as a result of that relationship, I emotionally incarcerated myself for more than ten years in a desperate attempt to protect my heart (of course I ended up doing more damage to myself than anyone could.) But it’s in the writing that you realize all these things, and that’s what the past decade+ of writing has helped me see. It wasn’t until I went to VONA (Voices of our Nation's Arts summer writing workshops) in 2009 that I really started believing that my stories do indeed matter and should be, need to be heard. In a word, VONA gave me permission.

There was a time when I resisted the stories that cracked my spine, bent me over into impossible positions. I'm not that limber. There is no human who is. It's why it's taken me over a decade to work through this first memoir. I was on my knees; now I'm on my tippy toes showing the world how tall 5 feet 2 inches can be.

In January, after feeling stuck because I couldn’t find the thread in the dozens of stories I'd penned, something shook loose after a grueling, what-are-you-afraid-of kind of conversation. I realized that this book is about my relationship with my mother and what happened that I left at 13. Once I had that, I threw myself into memory and the page because I’m from the school of: the only way out is in. I knew the first story and I knew the last. I gathered those I had in the middle and started filling in the gaps. And that is why and how today I am now compiling the stories that surfaced in my nightly ritual writing process.

I can feel the book in my hands. I can see the chapters. I can feel my fingers caressing it. I can see the epigraph and the quotes that start the chapters. I can see it all, for the first time in this years-long memoir process, I can finally see the first of the pentagonia, A Dim Capacity for Wings.

And now I have an opportunity to have a master writer work through the book with me, help me see where it is strong and where it is weak, help me see the book in its entirety. The thing is, as a teaching artist who quit her job two years ago to work with urban youth, I cannot afford to go to VONA on my current income. I need help. And if there’s anything I’ve learned from memoir, it’s that I have to humble myself and learn to ask for help and accept it when I need it. So I need it now. And so, I’m asking that you help me raise $2000 to attend VONA.

The fees include $700 for the residency + $650 for housing + airfare (which last time I checked was about $550) and all the particulars like cab fare and luggage fees.

What do you get?

I’ll gladly share an excerpt of my memoir along with a public recognition (unless you choose to remain anonymous, of course) of your help.

You can also help by sharing with your friends, family, network, etc.

Thank you for helping me live this dream!

You can see excerpt of my memoir and writings on the journey on my blog: http://vanessamartir.wordpress.com.

story:
Are you feeling exhausted by the modern worldâ€™s daily requests?
Have you ever felt that the world is falling on your back?
Do you feel like there is something you can do for yourself, but you don't know what?
Does your mind continuously buzz with thought, in a flow you can't control?
Is fear an emotion you know too well?
Are you looking for quiet?


If you have answered â€œyesâ€ to any of these questions, well, we have something in common. You are not the only one to feel this way, and I am here to give you PRECIOUS information.

You were in Shanghai, living the busy expat life, and checking off a few nice "YES" answers to the questions above. Until you decided to search for something in particular, something that could help, something good.
 
And then you found the T'ai Shen Project, which gives the possibility to live and learn among few Buddhist monks. You gave it a chance, immediately booking a bus ticket.

In the middle of the hills behind Zaoxi, 3 hours away from the chaos of Shanghai, there is a small haven of peace: the Guang Jue Temple.

As you arrived in the town near the temple, a thin, short figure came toward you: Malcolm Hunt, the founder of the project, an Australian who facilitates the mindfulness retreats and teaches Buddhist principles, speaking with warm and quiet kindness.
 
At the temple there were only two monks, because the other five work in town in order to economically sustain the life of the monastery.

Malcolm taught meditation to you and other guests; you shared talks about life and Dharma, sipping green tea before going to sleep on the hard mattress. It was the best sleep you have ever had.

A weekend spent there gave you and other people the chance to light the first spark of a little enlightenment, that small intangible thing you needed to see clearer and take action â€“ to make better your life and the lives of others around you.


This is what happened to me. 
This could happen to you.


The aim of these retreats has been to offer an opportunity for people to come and learn a way of life that promotes supreme happiness, peace, harmony, and prosperity for all people. 
For that is what Buddhism is â€“ a Life Education.
This is vitally important work, as those who come here plant seeds of peace, harmony, and compassion within their own hearts, benefitting the peace and well-being of everyone in their circle.

Financially, it has been challenging at times to keep the retreats going: they need funds to continue spreading good seeds.

You can join this cause; you can be part of it. You can support the project with a donation, or you can simply come and be a guest!

If you feel that you would like to contribute to a greater cause, with anything, any little amount of money, you are welcome: the cost of a cocktail in Europe or US would mean incredibly a lot.

Think about your action as something good, something simply good.

With your charity you will help more people than you can imagine.

Please click the â€œCONTRIBUTE NOWâ€ button on the side to help.


Thanks for your action,

Giorgio Faustini
former guest at the Guang Jue Temple


P.S.: With the T'ai Shen Project, 24 nations have passed through the temple gates and almost 200 people have stayed with the monks. So why is this significant? What does all this mean? --> We have to make it continue!!!

P.P.S.: if you need more info about the project, click here! http://www.taishendo.com/

story:
The Ballad of Wolfe Burton

Howdy Indiegogo, we're Dead Horse Creek! In March of 2018 our very own Ian Ellis (Bug LeBeaux), amateur author and hard-hitting drummer for our outfit, decided to take on the monumental task of turning our concept album, 1876: The Ballad of Wolfe Burton, into a full fledged novel. Nine months, 65,000 words, and 37 chapters later the book was finished. As much as we'd love for y'all to read it right now, it needs professional editing first. Funds raised here will go towards: editing services, commissioning artwork, and printing fees.

Risks & Challenges

We've set a tentative release date that should give us enough time to get everything put together and shipped out by. Having said that, there is no surefire way to know just how long the editing process will take so bear with us. We're only outlaws, after all. Note: Limited Edition Hard Back Copies may ship later than paper backs and eBooks due to their custom nature.

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow us:

https://www.facebook.com/DHCTX/

https://www.instagram.com/DHCTX/

https://bit.ly/DHC_TX (Spotify)

https://dhctx.bandcamp.com

https://www.dhctx.com

Stretch Goals

Any additional loot we find will go towards making the book the best it can be. Here are some things we'd like to add, given additional funding is available.

$3500 - Chapter Art

$5000 - Audio Book

Any other additional funding will go towards marketing!

story:
NEW EARTH GIVING:   (MISSION)

Mission

NEW EARTH GIVING’S mission is to create a revolutionary new way of living through opportunities in personal and global transformation.  This mission is accomplished via an all encompassing earth changing non-profit book, game, website organization,  magazine, and global movement.  It aims to amplify the idea of how a completely non-profit culture and economic system would positively change the earth.   Each aspect of  NEW EARTH GIVING (non-fiction book, journal, website, game,  magazine, products, communities, movements, and more) is designed to work cooperatively and harmonically with the overall and completely non-profit/co-operative mission of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG.    The key to its mission is in its name.  In the book we learn how to be able to truly "give" of our highest truest selves as well as seeing the earth and everything within our world as a relationship of giving of gratitude.  The organization's goal is to simply give (donate) as much of its proceeds as possible to other local and global non-profits, charities, and aid organizations as well as its own non-profit objectives.   NEW EARTH GIVING aims to do this in the most efficient, democratic, and compassionate way possible while utilizing the latest internet technology and logistic programs.   Its second goal is to create a sustainable non-profit infrastructure of community, commerce, and culture from literally the ground up that will in turn be the future communities, commerce, and culture of planet earth.  Lastly NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG will aim to unite many of the world's nonprofits and charities into one collective arena where the individual autonomy and unique purpose of each entity is wholly preserved and represented as such.    

Specifically NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG will aim to donate 90+% of its total revenue.    The purity, creativity, efficiency, transparency, interactivity,  networkability, and overall unifying ability  socially, culturally, and economically will be the hallmarks of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG.    It aims to be one of the main “hubs” of what is the new holistic giving culture of earth.  "Be the change you wish to see in the world!"


WHAT AND HOW    (In a Nutshell)

 Phase 1)  Book =  TRANSFORMATION/AWARENESS 

The book is designed to guide readers through their own personal transformation in "giving of themselves" (change yourself = change the world) as well inform and inspire to the visions of NEWEARTHGIVING (website, organization, communities, and more).  It is here where we begin to envision the reality how a completley non-profit  culture and economic system would completely change our world for the better.  The non-profit book also provides great exposure for the entire organization.

 Phase 2)  Website = NETWORKING/UNITING/FUNDING/RESOURCING/CREATE

The website is designed to unite people and non-profit, charity, global aid causes in a dynamic, unique, democratic, co-operative, and efficient manner to better facilitate "giving" of ourselves and to the many diverse needs of Earth.  The website is also the main funding platform of the organization.  It will aim to utilize the internet for its highest purpose and potential on earth.

 Phase 3)  Communities =  100%  NONPROFIT/SUSTAINABLE/CO-OPERATIVE  

The communities are designed to be the grounded, real, and purposeful expression of "living" whithin "NEWEARTHGIVING".     These communities will be pure (non-profit, sustainable, co-operative) in their entirety from the ground up.   Their design and developement will be creatively unique to each location yet always holding true to the core concepts of NEWEARTHGIVING.

Phase 4)  ALL OTHER =  (Game, Magazine, Documentary, Commerce,  Culture)

The expansion of "NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG"  the organization will give rise to many other forms of pure non-profit culture and commerce.  The sky is the limit to the endless possibilities of non-profit giving and gratitude.


Objectives:

1)  Create opportunities in personal and global transformation through book's, game's, magazines,  and website's theme of giving and gratitude

2)  Donate 90%+ of funds (from sales of book, game, products,  and online website donations) to local and global charities, conservation, aid, other non-profit organizations, as well as  NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG'S own causes ("communities", "commerce", "culture", etc...)   

3)  Create an online categorized directory of  local and global non-profits, charities, environmental, and aid organizations)

4)  Incorporate NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG as a 501c3/Subchapter T nonprofit/co-op organization in which its members will have a democratic voice within the organization.  Membership open to individuals and other non-profit entities.

6)  Create a website venue for the expression "giving" in many forms (online forum and discussion, exposure of other humanitarian and earth conscious organizations, art, music, health/wellness,  writing, pictures, social , eco-explorers, and more)

7)  Create an online store and commerce system for non-profit products (NEWEARTHGIVING and others)

8)  Create real "from the ground up"  100% non-profit and sustainable NEWEARTHGIVING COMMUNITIES. 

9)  Create ongoing documentary video (global) that visually ties together the agendas and causes of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG (communities, global aid and charity, personal stories, culture, news, events, and entertainment)  for the viewers/users of the website.

10)  Create an interactive virtual global map displaying activity of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG as well as individual regional needs.


Reasons to Donate Now!  What, How, Why, and What if?

* What?  

By donating now you are accelerating  the the overall objective to create personal and global transformation through the completion of the book and website.  If you are one that wishes to see positive change in your life and the world around you in one of the fastest ways imagined then NOW is the time to GIVE.  Start your journey in NEWEARTHGIVING by donating today!

*  How?

By donating now your money will help bring this project into reality and further promote the ideas and causes within this book and organization such as giving and gratitude, personal and global transformation,  aiding humanity and earth, and global unity.  It is simply up to you to donate now and pass the word along about NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG on indiegogo.com to places such as twitter, facebook, and emails.     If you are one who wants to know how to change the world simply be the "how" by donating today.  Start your NEWEARTHGIVING  by donating today!

*Why?

By donating now you will simply feel good and change your own karma and therefore your life in a positive way!  Not only will you feel good but you will also be changing the lives of millions of others as well as all creatures on planet earth.   With your direct contribution today your are changing the world for years to come.  Do it for yourself, do it for your children,  do it for your grandchildren, and do it for all of earth to come.    Your money will turn into positive changes that will ripple into the Seventh Generation and beyond.  Start your NEWEARTHGIVING by donating today!

*What if?

By donating now you are bringing a compassionate vision into reality.  What if NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG existed in its fullest capacity?  Well,  imagine a world where giving and gratitude is the law of the culture.  Imagine millions of people living compassionately and peacefully with each other.  Imagine a new non-profit infrastructure thriving within communities, commerce, education, agriculture, entertainment, and more.     The "what if" simply becomes "if now" we could only bring this project and organization to life, to reality, to earth.    Start your NEWEARTHFGIVING by donating today!


The earth is now in the palm of your hands. Be the change you wish to see in the world!  Please start your NEWEARTHGIVING by donating today!  Thank You!



NEW EARTH GIVING:    (Overview)


PHASE ONE…..BOOK (non-fiction):

What is NEW EARTH GIVING?   NEW EARTH GIVING  is a dynamic and compassionate revolutionary non-fiction book, website, movement, organization,  and much, much more.    NEW EARTH GIVING the book is only stage one of a personal and global journey toward peace,  prosperity, wellness, balance, love, and abundance for all of Earth through the basic concepts of giving and gratitude.   NEW EARTH GIVING the book is a 501c3 (majority of proceeds of book will be donated to NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG) non-profit literary work (about 43 short joy to read chapters) that is designed to awaken, inspire, empower, and enlighten people as well as the world to the amazing principal of giving and gratitude and how this simple concept is the key to all of our personal, relationships,  business, economics, wildlife, and environmental transformation into a healthy holistic state of being.   Every waking moment of life can be broken down to a state or choice of giving and gratitude (or lack thereof).  It is in these choices that we learn to find the opportunity  (vs. problem or  challenge)  in any given situation.  NEW EARTH GIVING  goes further to illustrate that God/the Universe has intentionally created our world to operate upon these principals as an ever evolving  world of giving and gratitude wherein every living thing… you, me, nature, science, quantum physics, cosmos, sun, moon,  and non-living thing is playing its part.  We simply must ask ourselves some very simple questions as to if we (humans) are truly playing our part in this beautiful theater of giving and gratitude.   And if we are not…the book explores step by step chapter by chapter process’s of awakening, learning, changing, and growing into our true purpose as the caretakers of planet earth. 

The journey of  NEW EARTH GIVING continues with the books second “part” dedicated to exploring the human “virtues” (ex. courage, will, compassion,  patience, humility, perseverance…etc….)and how they are inherently related to our role in giving and gratitude while on planet earth.  We also discover that our awareness, choices, and growth within these virtues will lead to the fastest healing of our planet as a whole as well as the most rewarding truths within our souls .  As within so without …as without so within.  NEW EARTH GIVING creates a simple and easy to comprehend picture for the reader to understand their connectivity, purpose, and overall unity of being human on earth.   Giving is redefined as “How can we truly give of ourselves?”…. followed by the question “Are we truly giving of ourselves?”.   After all it is God/the Universe’s divine design/intention (giving and gratitude)  for each individual to play their part (along with the rest of nature, earth, and the universe) by truly giving of themselves in their unique and divine manner.    NEW EARTH GIVING further explains that when we are not able to, are not willing to, are suppressed in some way, or are simply unaware of our own unique abilities to give we inherently end up “out of balance” with ourselves, our relationships, our families, our  businesses, our governments, and our earth as a whole.   NEW EARTH GIVING then asks  “What exactly is the state of our personal and global thoughts, actions, and relationships in giving and gratitude?” and “How can we empower  and transform ourselves through giving of our truest selves?"  

The third and final “part” of  NEW EARTH GIVING the book is a visionary look at how are outer world could be by adapting and incorporating the simple principals of giving and gratitude into our personal, family, education, science, business,  agriculture,  government,  wildlife, spirituality, environmental, community lives and more.  Step by step and category by category a new world of opportunity and possibility unfolds as NEW EARTH GIVING illuminates visionary and compassionate designs and developments  that “will” change the way we live upon our great planet earth.  The solutions and technology we seek lie deep within ourselves.  Here we also bridge the indigenous values and relationships with mother earth to how modern technologies will shape our planet in balance and harmony.  After reading this book the reader will be seeded with a feeling of  heartfelt inspiration, compassion, and empowerment while left with an optimistic understanding of “Yes it is possible to live in a world of giving and gratitude ...(balance)!”    The book further highlights an introduces NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG  the movement and non-profit organization which is the “engine” and catalyst of the entire NEW EARTH GIVING movement.  The NEW EARTH GIVING starts today.

NEW EARTH GIVING is not just a literary work.   It is also aims to be a creative and artistic wonder.  There will be full color images (illustrations) of inspiring  art work  (single artist, not yet decided…but some in mind …ex. Lindy Kehoe) at the beginning of each chapter coinciding with the title or theme of that chapter.    The art will capture the loving relationship between humanity and earth in all its abundance of numerous ways.    A thought provoking quote (in relationship to that chapters title) will also head the page of each new chapter (some quotes from enlightened people of past and present… and some from myself).   

At the end of each chapter there will be a uniquely designed journal question page.   This is not a self healing book….however it is a book of awakening and discovery.  The Journal questions are aimed to truly allow the reader take time to pause, think, and reflect about the meanings of  each chapter and how they relate to themselves as well as the world as a whole.   The journal questions also create New Earth Opportunities for the reader to literally experiment with in their everyday world.  The New Earth Giving JOURNAL may be sold with the book or separately.  Personal creativity and imagination will be encouraged throughout the boo (space provided for this in the journal as well).  

I have also created board game idea entitled “NEW EARTH GIVING the Game” that is based upon the concept of giving and providing global aid to all of the countries of earth based on each individual countries needs for that specific year (ex. 2014).   My goal is to launch the book, the website, and the game at the same time.


PHASE 2.….. WEB SITE:

NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG is a 501c3 non-profit website dedicated to creating  one of the most efficient, democratic,  and compassionate ways of donating money to global causes, non-profits, and charities while providing the viewers/users with a creative venue to express themselves via a blog/forum as well as an “express/socail” section for literary works, art, music, health/wellness, pictures, and NEW EARTH GIVING daily moments.

  The website will further invite and categorize a comprehensive geographical global directory of non-profit partners, charities,  businesses,  foundations,  and “friends” of NEW EARTH GIVING.   Donations to NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG will be divided and allotted to side agendas of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG ( Communities, Commerce, Culture, Education, Sustainability, Agriculture, Green Technology and the future affiliate site of ONESOURCEARTH.ORG).  

Users/individuals may also choose to donate to specific local and global non-profits and charities of the individuals/users choice via a large categorized directory.   A “donate locally” area upon the web-page will also allow users to do donate to an area of interest via an Interactive Global New Earth Giving Map.

 The last option of donation will be a hybrid of the previous two entitled the NEW EARTH GIVING FUND…..with this option "members" of the NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG non-profit co-op may donate funds and then take part in an online democracy/forum where funds will be allotted to weekly pre-chosen charities/non-profits based on the collective votes and discussion of participating members (with this option a smaller percentage of funds will automatically be applied to NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG).

The website will also aim to educate its users about its other aspects of non-profit communities,  commerce, education, agriculture, wellness, entertainment and more. The website will also aim to enlighten the users/individuals on the humanitarian and environmental topics of global unity and sustainability.... and how we may all play a part to help those in need.  Specific topics and areas of need/aid will be highlighted each week…..example:  world water crisis, hunger, poverty, environment…etc.


Phase 3...... Organize  Hybrid Non-profit/Co-op organization

 A main priority will be to organize and incorporate as a hybrid 501c3/Subchapter T Non-profit/Co-op corporation  with an electoral board of directors and employees.   All legal manners will be finalized at this juncture including the organizations "By-Laws".  At this stage of development I will be keeping this simple until further backing and funding is complete. A professional business plan is in the works with the organization having a board of directors,  web/tech manager,  and marketing/publicity manager.   


PHASE 4.……NEW EARTH GIVING COMMUNITIES

It is NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG'S mission to also  create NEW EARTH GIVING COMMUNITIES that  will also be entirely 501c3/subchapter T non-profit/co-op in their entirety from the ground up.   These communities will be the grounding back bone and ultimate showcase of how people can live sustainable and thrive within a “giving and gratitude” based non-profit community and culture (including agriculture, education, business, commerce,  entertainment,  architecture, healthcare, and more).      These communities will also be based upon a “pay it forward” principal with portions of proceeds  from one community going to start another community.  In this same manner a brother/sister community program will be constructed abroad to help those in poverty (globally) to build and construct their own NEWEARTHGIVING Community.    People will also be able to donate or "volunteer" time to all aspects of the communities agendas via NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG.  


PHASE 5.…..COMMERCE, CULTURE, ENTERTAINMENT, AND MORE

There is really no limit to the broad implications and usages of the non-profit/co-op  NEW EARTH GIVING business model.   I have developed numerous creative ideas using this model that could and would be globally transformative.  At this time I do not wish to unveil these  specific business models and entities as they will evolve in time.  For those who are donating large funds via Indiegogo.com I will offer personal emails or meetings once an agreement of non-disclosure has been signed.  Thank you for your patience and understanding.  For those who are very serious about changing the world in the fastest way possible please email me as soon as you conscience allows.  Thank You Again.

NEW EARTH GIVING:   Documentary Film

To compliment the book and website I also envision at some point in  NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG’S future creating a documentary ongoing (monthly? Quarterly? Yearly?)  web-film  that follows to live events and locations where (NEG) has donated aid, funds, and efforts.  The film would also take an ongoing look into the life at NEG Communities.  A documentary film could do what films do best …. “Create a clear picture and true connection for the general public about what is actually going on in the world and how NEWEARTHGIING.ORG is doing its part assist those in need.  

 The best of  NEWEARTHGIVING  “personal experiences” could also be video section within the website.

 

PHASE 6........Magazine

The NEW EARTH GIVING magazine will unite and highlight many important topics similar to the website.   The magazine could include a broad range of catagories such as 1) non-profits, charities, and global aid  2) NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG NEWS and EVENTS 3)  communities and culture 3) sustainability and envrionment 4) health and wellness 5) creativity (art, writing, music, and more) 6)  green business and technology 7)  personal stories  .... and more.



MONEY AND FUNDING NEEDED

At this moment in time I am estimating that I am about ¾  of the way through completion of my rough draft of the book.   I am estimating that it will take me about another 6 months to finish writing, organizing, editing,  illustrating,  creating the website,  creating a board of directors,  filing a 501c3,  finding the ideal publisher, and finalizing all other functions for a full launch of the organization.   I believe I am being optimistic yet realistic with this estimated time frame.   Once I have received funding I will fully utilize my god/universe given resources to streamline and network this book and organization into reality.  It is my destiny.   I have already researched much of this path via the internet and look forward to your contributions literally catalyzing and starting this long held dream in motion.     It is my life path to expand, create, and amplify the principals at hand (NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG) with networking,  connecting, and unification.  

Below is a list of estimated costs for Phase 1 and 2 (Book and Website).  (Phase 3 and 4 will start after 1 and 2’s completion) (estimated costs are based on internet research and some networking in the Seattle, WA area near which I am currently living)  As stated earlier I estimate to have phase 1 and 2  completed within 6 months.

1)  Editor:  

Full service start to finish and complete packaging of book start to finish and “Amazon Kindle ready” = $3500  (estimate….. adventurebooksofseattle.com)

2)  Web Design/Hosting/Ecommerce

Full service start to finish rough estimate = $5000 +/- (estimate…webstudiosseattle.com)

3)  Illustrator (Book Art)

Complete book one illustration per chapter = $5000  (estimate)

Current artists in mind…. Lindy Kehoe,  Elance.com (multiple artists Seattle)

Self Illustrating is another option.

4) Larger Professional  Publisher (example: Redwheel/Weiser …San Francisco)

Seeking a larger publisher to publish the book and journal will be the avenue sought for publishing New Earth Giving.   This would save on upfront cost as well as create  greater market and distribution.  This is the ideal goal and pursuit of New Earth Giving.  The aim here is not about personal profit but instead about reaching a wide, numerous,  and diverse audience.

  Self Publish (Option)

Publishing 10,000 copies of the book at its lowest estimate from two different online sources (self publishin.com, booksjustbooks.com). = $10,000 

Publishing 10,000 copies of the Journal = $5,000


5)  501c3 legal preparation and IRS fee

Legal  501c3 preparation estimates vary. The average from my research (Seattle) runs about $500 and this does not include any further legal representation.  I will estimate a minimum of another minimum of $500 for other legal advice and services in starting a 501c3 non-profit with the capabilities and capacity of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG. 

IRS 501c3 registration fee =  $850

Copyright = $35

Washington State 501c3 fee = $35

6) Optional- while writing, editing, organizing, networking (time, gas/travel expenses/, children expenses/support), creating a professional business plan,  creating illustrations/art  +(time, gas/travel expenses/, children expenses) over the 6 month period.  $500/mo = $3000


7)  Marketing

If self published the marketing expenses may further increase for such efforts as emarketing, travel marketing,  and other imagined marketing methods.  = $10,000 (estimate)


8)  Indigogo.com 5% Fee (When Fully Successful!)  =  $871


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 * Estimate of Total Funding needed for Project (Stage 1and 2) to Succeed :          $18,291

 $33,372 (self published) 

 $44,372 (with marketing)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


What's in it for you the Contributor?

As a contributor to New Earth Giving you will receive: 1) Tax deductibility of donation (once the organization is completely registered as a 501c3)  2) A free copy of New Earth Giving book and journal   3)  Recognition as a “Friend” of New Earth Giving upon the NewEarthGiving.Org website  4)  Other future products and updates from NewEarthGiving.Org  5) Opportunities for physically contributing or interacting with future NewEarthGiving events and business.

Lastly, all funds will be put towards the completion  and realization of all goals and agendas of New Earth Giving whether all/total funds are reached or not.  This is not a short term project but instead a long term life long mission that will continue in stages hopefully for generations to come. 


Personal Bio:

I thought I would include a “Bio” about myself  the author, inventor, and creator of NewEarthGiving.Org.     I am a 39 yr old proud father two amazing children (6 yr old daughter and 10 yr old son).   I have worked and lived a diverse array of life experiences (College: Bio/Chem, Sales and Marketing, Website Inventor, Teaching/Instructing, Manual Labor, Bio-Dynamic Gardening and more) and have always carried a deep inner knowing that I had something great within to share with the world.  I have always viewed the earth from an eagles eye’s perspective seeing the big picture of life.  Throughout my life I have succeeded within a balance of  work, learning, inventing, art, writing, poetry, hiking, dancing, meditation, and an extreme connection and love for nature and the outdoors.   Earth (or nature) has always been my inspiration, healing retreat, and one true home.  With this I truly feel that within each and every one of us resides this calling and connection to mother earth.   More specifically I have carried this “inner knowing”  (of compassion, amplification, and expansion) over the past 10 yrs that I needed to express and share with the rest of earth.   I feel that it is part of my personal awakening journey to inspire and catalyze part of the collective awakening journey for humanity.     Divinely over the past 11 years as a father and more specifically over the past 2 years I have been humbly called  back to earth with little funds for living expenses (much of the time camping in the Forest, much of this time in service to people, and much of this time Bio-dyanamic Gardening).   I was literally uprooted in my life and taken down a different spiritual path of trusting God/the Universe as well as finding and aligning with God/the Universe within.   The theme of my life has become the theme of this book and movement- NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG.   How can I truly give of myself?   In turn how can each and every individual truly give of themselves?   My journey is humanities journey.  I am looking forward to the journey, the learning, the love, and the giving of my self along this lifelong path of New Earth Giving.   I am also greatly looking forward to working with you the contributors/donators/givers in the near future.   In uniting together we can change our world!  Even if you cannot contribute funds please pass the “word” on to friends about  New Earth Giving (and indiegogo.com)!   Sincerely, Thank You!

Rest assure  from my life experiences (both personal and professional) that I have what it takes to "Spearhead" the organization of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG to success!  It is my life's passion and calling.


Whatever the human mind can conceive and believe it can achieve!

I fully believe if we create a virtual (website-organization) blueprint  of a sustainable, compassionate, and peaceful reality for the world to follow based on our own God/the Universe given intuitions, virtues, and truth of heart we could then achieve the peace, compassion, equality, sustainability we wish to see in the world.    “If we build it (virtually for all to understand) … the dream will come”.    Our thoughts and ideas become our reality.   Our putting these thoughts and ideas into physical writing confirms that their manifestation into reality has already begun.  When the tipping point of  the “collective” does the same the new reality is manifested and confirmed.   The fastest way to spread and idea aside from pure psychic thought connection with one another is though the power of the internet.   The internet is the jumpstart or spark of what then becomes a collective conscious wildfire.      Let us use this information resource (internet) in its wisest, truest, and purest of potential.  The internet is only mirroring out thoughts…. What exactly do we want to see in the mirror?  In turn the world is also mirroring our thoughts…. Again, what exactly do we want to see in the mirror?    

By giving of ourselves we in turn see that giving reflection created in the world around us.    Let the NEW EARTH GIVING begin!

Please give today!!!    Thank You!!!
