NEW EARTH GIVING:   (MISSION)
MissionNEW EARTH GIVING’S mission is to create a revolutionary new way of living through opportunities in personal and global transformation.  This mission is accomplished via an all encompassing earth changing non-profit book, game, website organization,  magazine, and global movement.  It aims to amplify the idea of how a completely non-profit culture and economic system would positively change the earth.   Each aspect of  NEW EARTH GIVING (non-fiction book, journal, website, game,  magazine, products, communities, movements, and more) is designed to work cooperatively and harmonically with the overall and completely non-profit/co-operative mission of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG.    The key to its mission is in its name.  In the book we learn how to be able to truly "give" of our highest truest selves as well as seeing the earth and everything within our world as a relationship of giving of gratitude.  The organization's goal is to simply give (donate) as much of its proceeds as possible to other local and global non-profits, charities, and aid organizations as well as its own non-profit objectives.   NEW EARTH GIVING aims to do this in the most efficient, democratic, and compassionate way possible while utilizing the latest internet technology and logistic programs.   Its second goal is to create a sustainable non-profit infrastructure of community, commerce, and culture from literally the ground up that will in turn be the future communities, commerce, and culture of planet earth.  Lastly NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG will aim to unite many of the world's nonprofits and charities into one collective arena where the individual autonomy and unique purpose of each entity is wholly preserved and represented as such.    
Specifically NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG will aim to donate 90+% of its total revenue.    The purity, creativity, efficiency, transparency, interactivity,  networkability, and overall unifying ability  socially, culturally, and economically will be the hallmarks of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG.    It aims to be one of the main “hubs” of what is the new holistic giving culture of earth.  "Be the change you wish to see in the world!"WHAT AND HOW    (In a Nutshell) Phase 1)  Book =  TRANSFORMATION/AWARENESS The book is designed to guide readers through their own personal transformation in "giving of themselves" (change yourself = change the world) as well inform and inspire to the visions of NEWEARTHGIVING (website, organization, communities, and more).  It is here where we begin to envision the reality how a completley non-profit  culture and economic system would completely change our world for the better.  The non-profit book also provides great exposure for the entire organization. Phase 2)  Website = NETWORKING/UNITING/FUNDING/RESOURCING/CREATEThe website is designed to unite people and non-profit, charity, global aid causes in a dynamic, unique, democratic, co-operative, and efficient manner to better facilitate "giving" of ourselves and to the many diverse needs of Earth.  The website is also the main funding platform of the organization.  It will aim to utilize the internet for its highest purpose and potential on earth. Phase 3)  Communities =  100%  NONPROFIT/SUSTAINABLE/CO-OPERATIVE  The communities are designed to be the grounded, real, and purposeful expression of "living" whithin "NEWEARTHGIVING".     These communities will be pure (non-profit, sustainable, co-operative) in their entirety from the ground up.   Their design and developement will be creatively unique to each location yet always holding true to the core concepts of NEWEARTHGIVING.Phase 4)  ALL OTHER =  (Game, Magazine, Documentary, Commerce,  Culture)The expansion of "NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG"  the organization will give rise to many other forms of pure non-profit culture and commerce.  The sky is the limit to the endless possibilities of non-profit giving and gratitude.
Objectives:
1)  Create opportunities in personal and global transformation through book's, game's, magazines,  and website's theme of giving and gratitude
2)  Donate 90%+ of funds (from sales of book, game, products,  and online website donations) to local and global charities, conservation, aid, other non-profit organizations, as well as  NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG'S own causes ("communities", "commerce", "culture", etc...)   
3)  Create an online categorized directory of  local and global non-profits, charities, environmental, and aid organizations)
4)  Incorporate NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG as a 501c3/Subchapter T nonprofit/co-op organization in which its members will have a democratic voice within the organization.  Membership open to individuals and other non-profit entities.
6)  Create a website venue for the expression "giving" in many forms (online forum and discussion, exposure of other humanitarian and earth conscious organizations, art, music, health/wellness,  writing, pictures, social , eco-explorers, and more)
7)  Create an online store and commerce system for non-profit products (NEWEARTHGIVING and others)
8)  Create real "from the ground up"  100% non-profit and sustainable NEWEARTHGIVING COMMUNITIES. 
9)  Create ongoing documentary video (global) that visually ties together the agendas and causes of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG (communities, global aid and charity, personal stories, culture, news, events, and entertainment)  for the viewers/users of the website.
10)  Create an interactive virtual global map displaying activity of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG as well as individual regional needs.

Reasons to Donate Now!  What, How, Why, and What if?
* What?  
By donating now you are accelerating  the the overall objective to create personal and global transformation through the completion of the book and website.  If you are one that wishes to see positive change in your life and the world around you in one of the fastest ways imagined then NOW is the time to GIVE.  Start your journey in NEWEARTHGIVING by donating today!
*  How?
By donating now your money will help bring this project into reality and further promote the ideas and causes within this book and organization such as giving and gratitude, personal and global transformation,  aiding humanity and earth, and global unity.  It is simply up to you to donate now and pass the word along about NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG on indiegogo.com to places such as twitter, facebook, and emails.     If you are one who wants to know how to change the world simply be the "how" by donating today.  Start your NEWEARTHGIVING  by donating today!
*Why?
By donating now you will simply feel good and change your own karma and therefore your life in a positive way!  Not only will you feel good but you will also be changing the lives of millions of others as well as all creatures on planet earth.   With your direct contribution today your are changing the world for years to come.  Do it for yourself, do it for your children,  do it for your grandchildren, and do it for all of earth to come.    Your money will turn into positive changes that will ripple into the Seventh Generation and beyond.  Start your NEWEARTHGIVING by donating today!
*What if?
By donating now you are bringing a compassionate vision into reality.  What if NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG existed in its fullest capacity?  Well,  imagine a world where giving and gratitude is the law of the culture.  Imagine millions of people living compassionately and peacefully with each other.  Imagine a new non-profit infrastructure thriving within communities, commerce, education, agriculture, entertainment, and more.     The "what if" simply becomes "if now" we could only bring this project and organization to life, to reality, to earth.    Start your NEWEARTHFGIVING by donating today!

The earth is now in the palm of your hands. Be the change you wish to see in the world!  Please start your NEWEARTHGIVING by donating today!  Thank You!


NEW EARTH GIVING:    (Overview)

PHASE ONE…..BOOK (non-fiction):
What is NEW EARTH GIVING?   NEW EARTH GIVING  is a dynamic and compassionate revolutionary non-fiction book, website, movement, organization,  and much, much more.    NEW EARTH GIVING the book is only stage one of a personal and global journey toward peace,  prosperity, wellness, balance, love, and abundance for all of Earth through the basic concepts of giving and gratitude.   NEW EARTH GIVING the book is a 501c3 (majority of proceeds of book will be donated to NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG) non-profit literary work (about 43 short joy to read chapters) that is designed to awaken, inspire, empower, and enlighten people as well as the world to the amazing principal of giving and gratitude and how this simple concept is the key to all of our personal, relationships,  business, economics, wildlife, and environmental transformation into a healthy holistic state of being.   Every waking moment of life can be broken down to a state or choice of giving and gratitude (or lack thereof).  It is in these choices that we learn to find the opportunity  (vs. problem or  challenge)  in any given situation.  NEW EARTH GIVING  goes further to illustrate that God/the Universe has intentionally created our world to operate upon these principals as an ever evolving  world of giving and gratitude wherein every living thing… you, me, nature, science, quantum physics, cosmos, sun, moon,  and non-living thing is playing its part.  We simply must ask ourselves some very simple questions as to if we (humans) are truly playing our part in this beautiful theater of giving and gratitude.   And if we are not…the book explores step by step chapter by chapter process’s of awakening, learning, changing, and growing into our true purpose as the caretakers of planet earth. 
The journey of  NEW EARTH GIVING continues with the books second “part” dedicated to exploring the human “virtues” (ex. courage, will, compassion,  patience, humility, perseverance…etc….)and how they are inherently related to our role in giving and gratitude while on planet earth.  We also discover that our awareness, choices, and growth within these virtues will lead to the fastest healing of our planet as a whole as well as the most rewarding truths within our souls .  As within so without …as without so within.  NEW EARTH GIVING creates a simple and easy to comprehend picture for the reader to understand their connectivity, purpose, and overall unity of being human on earth.   Giving is redefined as “How can we truly give of ourselves?”…. followed by the question “Are we truly giving of ourselves?”.   After all it is God/the Universe’s divine design/intention (giving and gratitude)  for each individual to play their part (along with the rest of nature, earth, and the universe) by truly giving of themselves in their unique and divine manner.    NEW EARTH GIVING further explains that when we are not able to, are not willing to, are suppressed in some way, or are simply unaware of our own unique abilities to give we inherently end up “out of balance” with ourselves, our relationships, our families, our  businesses, our governments, and our earth as a whole.   NEW EARTH GIVING then asks  “What exactly is the state of our personal and global thoughts, actions, and relationships in giving and gratitude?” and “How can we empower  and transform ourselves through giving of our truest selves?"  
The third and final “part” of  NEW EARTH GIVING the book is a visionary look at how are outer world could be by adapting and incorporating the simple principals of giving and gratitude into our personal, family, education, science, business,  agriculture,  government,  wildlife, spirituality, environmental, community lives and more.  Step by step and category by category a new world of opportunity and possibility unfolds as NEW EARTH GIVING illuminates visionary and compassionate designs and developments  that “will” change the way we live upon our great planet earth.  The solutions and technology we seek lie deep within ourselves.  Here we also bridge the indigenous values and relationships with mother earth to how modern technologies will shape our planet in balance and harmony.  After reading this book the reader will be seeded with a feeling of  heartfelt inspiration, compassion, and empowerment while left with an optimistic understanding of “Yes it is possible to live in a world of giving and gratitude ...(balance)!”    The book further highlights an introduces NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG  the movement and non-profit organization which is the “engine” and catalyst of the entire NEW EARTH GIVING movement.  The NEW EARTH GIVING starts today.
NEW EARTH GIVING is not just a literary work.   It is also aims to be a creative and artistic wonder.  There will be full color images (illustrations) of inspiring  art work  (single artist, not yet decided…but some in mind …ex. Lindy Kehoe) at the beginning of each chapter coinciding with the title or theme of that chapter.    The art will capture the loving relationship between humanity and earth in all its abundance of numerous ways.    A thought provoking quote (in relationship to that chapters title) will also head the page of each new chapter (some quotes from enlightened people of past and present… and some from myself).   
At the end of each chapter there will be a uniquely designed journal question page.   This is not a self healing book….however it is a book of awakening and discovery.  The Journal questions are aimed to truly allow the reader take time to pause, think, and reflect about the meanings of  each chapter and how they relate to themselves as well as the world as a whole.   The journal questions also create New Earth Opportunities for the reader to literally experiment with in their everyday world.  The New Earth Giving JOURNAL may be sold with the book or separately.  Personal creativity and imagination will be encouraged throughout the boo (space provided for this in the journal as well).  
I have also created board game idea entitled “NEW EARTH GIVING the Game” that is based upon the concept of giving and providing global aid to all of the countries of earth based on each individual countries needs for that specific year (ex. 2014).   My goal is to launch the book, the website, and the game at the same time.

PHASE 2.….. WEB SITE:
NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG is a 501c3 non-profit website dedicated to creating  one of the most efficient, democratic,  and compassionate ways of donating money to global causes, non-profits, and charities while providing the viewers/users with a creative venue to express themselves via a blog/forum as well as an “express/socail” section for literary works, art, music, health/wellness, pictures, and NEW EARTH GIVING daily moments.
  The website will further invite and categorize a comprehensive geographical global directory of non-profit partners, charities,  businesses,  foundations,  and “friends” of NEW EARTH GIVING.   Donations to NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG will be divided and allotted to side agendas of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG ( Communities, Commerce, Culture, Education, Sustainability, Agriculture, Green Technology and the future affiliate site of ONESOURCEARTH.ORG).  
Users/individuals may also choose to donate to specific local and global non-profits and charities of the individuals/users choice via a large categorized directory.   A “donate locally” area upon the web-page will also allow users to do donate to an area of interest via an Interactive Global New Earth Giving Map.
 The last option of donation will be a hybrid of the previous two entitled the NEW EARTH GIVING FUND…..with this option "members" of the NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG non-profit co-op may donate funds and then take part in an online democracy/forum where funds will be allotted to weekly pre-chosen charities/non-profits based on the collective votes and discussion of participating members (with this option a smaller percentage of funds will automatically be applied to NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG).
The website will also aim to educate its users about its other aspects of non-profit communities,  commerce, education, agriculture, wellness, entertainment and more. The website will also aim to enlighten the users/individuals on the humanitarian and environmental topics of global unity and sustainability.... and how we may all play a part to help those in need.  Specific topics and areas of need/aid will be highlighted each week…..example:  world water crisis, hunger, poverty, environment…etc.

Phase 3...... Organize  Hybrid Non-profit/Co-op organization
 A main priority will be to organize and incorporate as a hybrid 501c3/Subchapter T Non-profit/Co-op corporation  with an electoral board of directors and employees.   All legal manners will be finalized at this juncture including the organizations "By-Laws".  At this stage of development I will be keeping this simple until further backing and funding is complete. A professional business plan is in the works with the organization having a board of directors,  web/tech manager,  and marketing/publicity manager.   

PHASE 4.……NEW EARTH GIVING COMMUNITIES
It is NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG'S mission to also  create NEW EARTH GIVING COMMUNITIES that  will also be entirely 501c3/subchapter T non-profit/co-op in their entirety from the ground up.   These communities will be the grounding back bone and ultimate showcase of how people can live sustainable and thrive within a “giving and gratitude” based non-profit community and culture (including agriculture, education, business, commerce,  entertainment,  architecture, healthcare, and more).      These communities will also be based upon a “pay it forward” principal with portions of proceeds  from one community going to start another community.  In this same manner a brother/sister community program will be constructed abroad to help those in poverty (globally) to build and construct their own NEWEARTHGIVING Community.    People will also be able to donate or "volunteer" time to all aspects of the communities agendas via NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG.  

PHASE 5.…..COMMERCE, CULTURE, ENTERTAINMENT, AND MORE
There is really no limit to the broad implications and usages of the non-profit/co-op  NEW EARTH GIVING business model.   I have developed numerous creative ideas using this model that could and would be globally transformative.  At this time I do not wish to unveil these  specific business models and entities as they will evolve in time.  For those who are donating large funds via Indiegogo.com I will offer personal emails or meetings once an agreement of non-disclosure has been signed.  Thank you for your patience and understanding.  For those who are very serious about changing the world in the fastest way possible please email me as soon as you conscience allows.  Thank You Again.
NEW EARTH GIVING:   Documentary Film

To compliment the book and website I also envision at some point in  NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG’S future creating a documentary ongoing (monthly? Quarterly? Yearly?)  web-film  that follows to live events and locations where (NEG) has donated aid, funds, and efforts.  The film would also take an ongoing look into the life at NEG Communities.  A documentary film could do what films do best …. “Create a clear picture and true connection for the general public about what is actually going on in the world and how NEWEARTHGIING.ORG is doing its part assist those in need.  
 The best of  NEWEARTHGIVING  “personal experiences” could also be video section within the website.
 
PHASE 6........Magazine
The NEW EARTH GIVING magazine will unite and highlight many important topics similar to the website.   The magazine could include a broad range of catagories such as 1) non-profits, charities, and global aid  2) NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG NEWS and EVENTS 3)  communities and culture 3) sustainability and envrionment 4) health and wellness 5) creativity (art, writing, music, and more) 6)  green business and technology 7)  personal stories  .... and more.

MONEY AND FUNDING NEEDED
At this moment in time I am estimating that I am about ¾  of the way through completion of my rough draft of the book.   I am estimating that it will take me about another 6 months to finish writing, organizing, editing,  illustrating,  creating the website,  creating a board of directors,  filing a 501c3,  finding the ideal publisher, and finalizing all other functions for a full launch of the organization.   I believe I am being optimistic yet realistic with this estimated time frame.   Once I have received funding I will fully utilize my god/universe given resources to streamline and network this book and organization into reality.  It is my destiny.   I have already researched much of this path via the internet and look forward to your contributions literally catalyzing and starting this long held dream in motion.     It is my life path to expand, create, and amplify the principals at hand (NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG) with networking,  connecting, and unification.  
Below is a list of estimated costs for Phase 1 and 2 (Book and Website).  (Phase 3 and 4 will start after 1 and 2’s completion) (estimated costs are based on internet research and some networking in the Seattle, WA area near which I am currently living)  As stated earlier I estimate to have phase 1 and 2  completed within 6 months.
1)  Editor:  
Full service start to finish and complete packaging of book start to finish and “Amazon Kindle ready” = $3500  (estimate….. adventurebooksofseattle.com)
2)  Web Design/Hosting/Ecommerce
Full service start to finish rough estimate = $5000 +/- (estimate…webstudiosseattle.com)
3)  Illustrator (Book Art)
Complete book one illustration per chapter = $5000  (estimate)
Current artists in mind…. Lindy Kehoe,  Elance.com (multiple artists Seattle)
Self Illustrating is another option.
4) Larger Professional  Publisher (example: Redwheel/Weiser …San Francisco)
Seeking a larger publisher to publish the book and journal will be the avenue sought for publishing New Earth Giving.   This would save on upfront cost as well as create  greater market and distribution.  This is the ideal goal and pursuit of New Earth Giving.  The aim here is not about personal profit but instead about reaching a wide, numerous,  and diverse audience.
  Self Publish (Option)
Publishing 10,000 copies of the book at its lowest estimate from two different online sources (self publishin.com, booksjustbooks.com). = $10,000 
Publishing 10,000 copies of the Journal = $5,000

5)  501c3 legal preparation and IRS fee
Legal  501c3 preparation estimates vary. The average from my research (Seattle) runs about $500 and this does not include any further legal representation.  I will estimate a minimum of another minimum of $500 for other legal advice and services in starting a 501c3 non-profit with the capabilities and capacity of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG. 
IRS 501c3 registration fee =  $850
Copyright = $35
Washington State 501c3 fee = $35
6) Optional- while writing, editing, organizing, networking (time, gas/travel expenses/, children expenses/support), creating a professional business plan,  creating illustrations/art  +(time, gas/travel expenses/, children expenses) over the 6 month period.  $500/mo = $3000

7)  Marketing
If self published the marketing expenses may further increase for such efforts as emarketing, travel marketing,  and other imagined marketing methods.  = $10,000 (estimate)

8)  Indigogo.com 5% Fee (When Fully Successful!)  =  $871
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 * Estimate of Total Funding needed for Project (Stage 1and 2) to Succeed :          $18,291
 $33,372 (self published) 
 $44,372 (with marketing)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What's in it for you the Contributor?

As a contributor to New Earth Giving you will receive: 1) Tax deductibility of donation (once the organization is completely registered as a 501c3)  2) A free copy of New Earth Giving book and journal   3)  Recognition as a “Friend” of New Earth Giving upon the NewEarthGiving.Org website  4)  Other future products and updates from NewEarthGiving.Org  5) Opportunities for physically contributing or interacting with future NewEarthGiving events and business.
Lastly, all funds will be put towards the completion  and realization of all goals and agendas of New Earth Giving whether all/total funds are reached or not.  This is not a short term project but instead a long term life long mission that will continue in stages hopefully for generations to come. 
Personal Bio:
I thought I would include a “Bio” about myself  the author, inventor, and creator of NewEarthGiving.Org.     I am a 39 yr old proud father two amazing children (6 yr old daughter and 10 yr old son).   I have worked and lived a diverse array of life experiences (College: Bio/Chem, Sales and Marketing, Website Inventor, Teaching/Instructing, Manual Labor, Bio-Dynamic Gardening and more) and have always carried a deep inner knowing that I had something great within to share with the world.  I have always viewed the earth from an eagles eye’s perspective seeing the big picture of life.  Throughout my life I have succeeded within a balance of  work, learning, inventing, art, writing, poetry, hiking, dancing, meditation, and an extreme connection and love for nature and the outdoors.   Earth (or nature) has always been my inspiration, healing retreat, and one true home.  With this I truly feel that within each and every one of us resides this calling and connection to mother earth.   More specifically I have carried this “inner knowing”  (of compassion, amplification, and expansion) over the past 10 yrs that I needed to express and share with the rest of earth.   I feel that it is part of my personal awakening journey to inspire and catalyze part of the collective awakening journey for humanity.     Divinely over the past 11 years as a father and more specifically over the past 2 years I have been humbly called  back to earth with little funds for living expenses (much of the time camping in the Forest, much of this time in service to people, and much of this time Bio-dyanamic Gardening).   I was literally uprooted in my life and taken down a different spiritual path of trusting God/the Universe as well as finding and aligning with God/the Universe within.   The theme of my life has become the theme of this book and movement- NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG.   How can I truly give of myself?   In turn how can each and every individual truly give of themselves?   My journey is humanities journey.  I am looking forward to the journey, the learning, the love, and the giving of my self along this lifelong path of New Earth Giving.   I am also greatly looking forward to working with you the contributors/donators/givers in the near future.   In uniting together we can change our world!  Even if you cannot contribute funds please pass the “word” on to friends about  New Earth Giving (and indiegogo.com)!   Sincerely, Thank You!
Rest assure  from my life experiences (both personal and professional) that I have what it takes to "Spearhead" the organization of NEWEARTHGIVING.ORG to success!  It is my life's passion and calling.

Whatever the human mind can conceive and believe it can achieve!
I fully believe if we create a virtual (website-organization) blueprint  of a sustainable, compassionate, and peaceful reality for the world to follow based on our own God/the Universe given intuitions, virtues, and truth of heart we could then achieve the peace, compassion, equality, sustainability we wish to see in the world.    “If we build it (virtually for all to understand) … the dream will come”.    Our thoughts and ideas become our reality.   Our putting these thoughts and ideas into physical writing confirms that their manifestation into reality has already begun.  When the tipping point of  the “collective” does the same the new reality is manifested and confirmed.   The fastest way to spread and idea aside from pure psychic thought connection with one another is though the power of the internet.   The internet is the jumpstart or spark of what then becomes a collective conscious wildfire.      Let us use this information resource (internet) in its wisest, truest, and purest of potential.  The internet is only mirroring out thoughts…. What exactly do we want to see in the mirror?  In turn the world is also mirroring our thoughts…. Again, what exactly do we want to see in the mirror?    
By giving of ourselves we in turn see that giving reflection created in the world around us.    Let the NEW EARTH GIVING begin!
Please give today!!!    Thank You!!!

story:
Are you Awake?

A few links to past writings:

What do you believe?

I dream to dream.

Dreams are your fuel.

Remembering You.

Hello there! I hope by now you have gotten a glimpse of the Dreamscape, and what's to come...

I have decided to make this project as personal as possible, going through self publishing, local printing and raising the funds to do so with the help of those who have been following me on my journey from the very beginning and hopefully newcomers who see themselves in me as well!  I really wanted to make everyone feel as though they were a part of this project, because quite frankly - you all are! I seriously would not be where I am today had it not been for all of the support, love and reassurance the digital plane (the internet/social media/etc) has gifted me over the years; this is somewhat my gift to anyone who has ever believed in me.

I am beyond ecstatic to share my vision and work at this point and can only hope that after review you feel the same!


It is about coming in and out of awareness, time and time again through dreams and how we only forget when we cease to awaken and create. The story itself was written based on my 'adventures' in the Dreamscape through astral projections, out of body experiences, channeling, and lucid dreams I have had throughout my life, as well as practices from the past couple years in those matters. Golden Mirrors: Enter the Dreamscape, suggests a mentality beyond the norm - one of positivity, and light - which helps one manifest and bring thoughts into fruition through pure intention and belief in ONESELF. 

The book itself is 75 percent complete - I am currently working on laying out the manuscript in a format that flows best, and once that step is through I will be sending it off for editing. The amount that I am attempting to raise is the minimum I need to cover the cost of self-publishing, illustrations, rewards, printing, distribution, and indiegogo/processing fees & percentages taken from the final amount raised. 

My goal is to have the advance copy paperbacks printed by Christmas, with an official release date (to Amazon, Barnes and Noble Online, etc) on February 22nd, 2014.

On top of this, if I am able to reach $6,000, a goal beyond the one set, I will be able to pay for studio time and record an audio book version for you all. Also, if I am able to reach my original goal of $8,000, I will be printing 100 copies of Limited Edition, Gold Hardcovers - which will seriously be a work of art in themselves. I personally can not wait to have a copy on my shelf!! A "Dreamer's Bible" if you will...

Rewards, you say?

I have partnered up with amazing artists (Chuck Inglish, Erica Fiero, Crystal Peralta, etc. to name a few), in order to make this as beautiful as I dreamed and to be able to provide for all of you - unique, special gifts as an exchange for your belief in me and my work... 

Check out the rad gift details on the right ----->

Book Art

With your help, I will be able to bring my visions to life! 

Scanned image of a really simple, personal rough sketch and an illustrated draft, that will be sent to the artist/illustrator to remaster for the book's cover-art! :)


Here are a few examples of what will be remastered by a professional artist once funded:

Personal rough sketches to be remastered by artist/illustrator for book art.


Final Words

If I cannot meet my goal for this project, I will not be able to fund it. This is an all or nothing scenario. Thus, I will be putting my whole efforts, along with my heart and soul, to reach my goal of $4000... and hopefully able to reach the $8,000 mark as well to be able to work on the masterpiece itself!  If we cannot meet my goal, no money will be given to me... no books will be printed, everyone will be sad and no rewards will be gifted. I believe in this work that much.


Risks and challenges

There are risks in delivering any printed product, but mostly in terms of the deadline. It may take longer than expected to revise the proofs, create the visuals that will go along with the writing – or even to deliver the books to you. With that said however, I do not see any drastic risk or challenge as the most difficult part (in writing the actual book) is already through. If anything does in fact arise, I will be sure to update you all as soon as it does and work my hardest to remove such hurdles from the path.

I am grateful you watched my video, read my project description, and hopefully contributed to my indiegogo campaign.

Thank you so much for your time, consideration and support!!

With gratitude,

Dulce Ruby

xx

story:
Short Summary

For the last 10 years I’ve been touring the country as an independent performance poet, social justice organizer, and as a musician with my band Prayers For Atheists.  There’s a map on my wall with over 135 thumb thumb tacks— one for almost every city I’ve performed in.  It’s been a long journey but for the first time since I started, I’m taking an extended break from the road in order to write my first book of creative non-fiction and personal essays.  These will be traveling stories, protest stories, and radical art adventures that cover everything from myself and other protesters temporarily placing three Boston police officers under citizen’s arrest for assaulting members of the crowd at the Democratic National Convention— to my DIY touring in Europe, winding through the peaks and valleys of the German-Austrian Alps in a mobile trailer home full of bohemian poets and gypsy travelers— civil disobedience outside of IMF Conferences in Washington, D.C., and traveling through most of the continental U.S. by train and bus.  It’ll also feature more humorous anecdotes like me getting chased out of the ESPN X-Games for spitting on Eminem!  Did I really spit on Eminem?  Yes, I spit on Eminem, but he was being extremely abusive to a good friend of mine at the time and I felt obligated to interject.  It’s a long story, with more details than we have time to get into here... which is why there needs to be a book!


What We Need & What You Get

I have a great studio to write in and all the source material I need to complete the manuscript, all I’m lacking is the financial stability to get it done.  Which is why I’m launching this campaign for a crowd funded writing residency.  With your sponsorship, I’ll be able to spend six to eight hours a day writing and editing my work, without having to constantly book shows and travel in order to stay alive.  At that rate, I believe I could have the bulk of the manuscript completed within six months.  My absolute bare bones minimum living expenses for one month are approximately $1,100.  6 month’s x $1,100 = $6,600, so, that’s what we’re aiming for.

In addition to the satisfaction of helping put a book like this out into the world, sponsors will receive a wide range of rewards in return, such as having your name listed in the official Radical Arts Sponsor page in the final book, copies of my brand new live spoken word album, limited edition signed screen print posters, and signed copies of the completed book when it’s released!  There will also be more hands-on, real time rewards like one on one writing and performance workshops (in person or via Skype), editing help with a poem or short story of the sponsor’s choice, my Top 10 Original “Jared Paul Vegan Gluten Free” cooking recipes, advanced screening of chapters and more.


The Impact

After years of surviving as a full time independent artist, I’ve learned that DIY isn’t really Do It Yourself, it’s “do it yourself with help from people who care.”  If I didn’t have supporters throwing shows for me around the country, coming out to my events, or buying merch, then I wouldn’t have much of a career.  Which is why I put my heart, mind, and guts into every piece of art I create and each show I perform— that’s where I hold up my end of the bargain.  This crowd sourced writing residency is no different.  If you invest, not only will you be supporting independent art and helping to sponsor a superbly crafted piece of literature, you’ll be taking part in the documentation of rare and alternative perspectives into the nuts and bolts history of the modern American counter-culture experience, telling a side of the story that is, quite honestly, seldom covered.

I believe in this book with all my heart.  I’m inviting you to invest— and to become part of this collection of stories that I believe people will be reading and talking about for many years to come.


FAQ:  "What Type Of Stories?"

*Based on questions I've fielded at the merch booth after shows, via social media, at the National Poetry Slam, at family gatherings, and elsewhere.


Q:  Were you really there when Iraq Veterans Against War marched to the Convention Center barricades during the 2008 DNC and riot police began to resign their posts because they didn’t want to get caught attacking U.S. war veterans on camera?  

A:  When cops start disobeying orders, the movement has definitely done something right.  It’s a long story but I was definitely there, and will for sure go into detail in these upcoming essays.


Q:  Did you really spit in Eminem's face?

A:  Uhh... um... yes.  Yes, I spit on Eminem, but he was being really abusive to a good friend of mine at the time and I felt obligated to retaliate.  Was it a total dick move on my part?  Maybe, but it sure felt right at the time!  You’ll have to read the full story and judge for yourself...


Q:  Is it true that you fled the state of Missouri before St. Louis park police could detain you for indecent exposure after an anti Guantanamo Prison street theater during Opening Ceremonies of the 2006 National Poetry Slam in St. Louis?

A:  No Comment.  This may or may not get covered in the book.  Actually, now that I think about it... fuck it!  This will be written about in great detail.


Q:  Some have said that you have the best soup recipes in the Northeast, is this true?

A:  I'm not gonna lie, my soups and stews are pretty damned good.  Mom taught us how to cook:  with LOVE.  She keeps pushing me to open a restaurant or a soup cart at least.  There will be a few recipes in the book...


Q:  What are the "Neo Clowns For War and Impoverishment?"  Have you ever dressed up as a clown with a bunch of crazies and shut down a delegate host hotel during an IMF conference in Washington, D.C.?

A: Hmmmm.  "Shut down" is a pretty subjective term, you know?  I will say that clowns are AWESOME, and that the IMF is NOT.  There may be a whole chapter devoted to this in the final manuscript!


Q:  Why did Nevada police detain you and the rest of the member’s of Sage Francis’s 2005 “A Healthy Distrust Tour” outside of Lake Mead?

A:  Good question!  He detained us because he hadn’t yet come to the conclusion that we were a christian rock band.  Wait... WERE we a christian rock band?!  Another adventure I’m excited to share.

A:  I'm not gonna lie, my soups and stews are pretty damned good.  Mom taught us how to cook:  with LOVE.  She keeps pushing me to open a restaurant or a soup cart at least.  There will be a few recipes in the book...
Q:  What are the "Neo Clowns For War and Impoverishment?"  Have you ever dressed up as a clown with a bunch of crazies and shut down a delegate host hotel during an IMF conference in Washington, D.C.?
A: Hmmmm.  "Shut down" is a pretty subjective term, you know?  I will say that clowns are AWESOME, and that the IMF is NOT.  There may be a whole chapter devoted to this in the final manuscript!
Q:  Why did Nevada police detain you and the rest of the member’s of Sage Francis’s 2005 “A Healthy Distrust Tour” outside of Lake Mead?
A:  Good question!  He detained us because he hadn’t yet come to the conclusion that we were a christian rock band.  Wait... WERE we a christian rock band?!  Another adventure I’m excited to share.

story:
"Raising His Children"

Many asked me "What did you do to have such amazing children?' My  reply to them has always been "to God be the Glory". But after receiving the same comment from different people over a number of years I felt compelled to actually write down the accounts of what God led me to do.

Why should you buy this book?

This book will definitely unlock some mysteries when it comes to raising children and help gain insight that will help many build better and more effective relationships with their children or the children they may be helping to raise.

  • Be the first to contribute toward a movement of our future generation
  • Receive a personalized, encouraging autographed message from the Author

Your Impact

Helping one house hold at a time to build family, affect a community, a state and ultimately the world.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Feel free to pass this information on to your family and friends through social media and by word of mouth.

Thank you for your support!

story:
My Story

Hi my name is Margo Nagy.

I am an Author, Coach, Energy Healer & Angel Healer

For 26 years I suffered from Chronic Fatigue Syndrome(CFS), which included: paralyzing fatigue, depression, insomnia, anxiety and brain fog. At one point I almost died. I was so frustrated and depressed, a couple times I was suicidal. At times I would feel better then relapse. However, I never regained this radiant health and mental clarity that I have now. After trying everything to heal...I finally did! The key to healing CFS, depression, insomnia and anxiety is a condition called, "Reversed Polarity". I recently self published a book about how to heal all of this titled, "RADIANT HEALTH & HAPPINESS IS POSSIBLE - How I healed from Chronic Fatigue Syndrome"

Your polarity can become reversed from trauma or stress. Then it causes static in your central nervous system. Your brain then doesn't produce Serotonin - so you become depressed, and your immune system and mind does not rejuvenate. Fortunately this can be normalized with an Herbal program or energetically. Then your body is able to heal itself!

I managed to self publish this book all by myself...now I need money to market and promote it, so this life changing information gets out.

 

The Impact

With the help of a professional book marketing expert I can reach more people. Then people can heal all over the world. If I don't get the money to pay for marketing and promoting experts, then this valuable information may not reach those who need it.

 

What I Need & What You Get

I need $10,000 for a professional marketing and promotional campaign with the firm Author Marketing Experts Inc. This can be broken down such as $4,595 for a Virtual Book Tour and $1,375 for a Radio and Print Advertising Campaign, etc. These can be purchased separately.

I need approximately $1,000 for a professional website. I would need at least $4,000 to do a regular book tour and speaking tour.

If I don't reach my goal I will just pay for what I can. Every bit helps. If I go over my goal I will use some of that money to pay for the Herbal Program for those who can not afford to. Unfortunately there are people who can not afford the Herbal Program. With any other money left I will further invest in getting this information out.

The Perks I am offering can be gifted to anyone of your choice. I'm giving away autographed books, healing sessions and unforgettable trips to Kauai. Imagine spending a week in Kauai with me showing you all the magical places... including a swim with the dolphins!

To follow the progress of my campaign check the "Updates" feature. Here I'll be posting updates and photos.

 

PayPal is my preferred payment option.


Other Ways You Can Help

You can really help me....by spreading the word about this campaign. This can be done easily by using the share tools in the Share Box directly below my Pitch Video. And you can provide feedback on the Comment Tab.

 

Thank you so much for your time. Let's make this world a Healthier & Happier place!

story:
The Just Imagine Fiction's Goals

  • Connect with people of all ages
  • Utilize short fiction to convey God's word in an accessible manner
  • Inspire adults to become the passionate people the world needs them to be
  • Create both print and electronic versions to reach the broadest possible group of readers
  • The award-winning author is dedicated to reaching people in a more direct manner than a traditional publisher can achieve

Why Support The Just Imagine Fiction

The Just Imagine Fiction Series will of course motivate adults to read more and enjoy it more fully.  More importantly, it will inspire them to relate to others on a more humane and compassionate level.  With so many recent studies showing that people today are significantly less compassionate than previous generations, the Just Imagine Fiction series is needed now more than ever.

Beyond helping to address the growing social ailment, the Just Imagine Fiction series will inspire people to find their true calling in life.  With the purpose and meaning found in God's word, they will become the passionate people the world needs them to be.

Individual stories in the Just Imagine Fiction series will lead readers to think through the consequences of decisions that might harm themselves or others in the long run.

Reading material that supports scriptural values and that targets people between the ages of 18 to 80 is limited.  The Just Imagine Fiction series will help fill that void and provide an important service to the generation that will soon become the leaders of our world.  Descriptions of the real experiences that inspired a few of these stories along with descriptions of purely fictional stories are shared here.

God's Tears. Daily torrential rains led the author into a depression that imprisoned her in her home.  While staring out the bedroom window one morning, a quiet voice said that the raindrops were God's tears.  The downpours were His way of letting us know that He is displeased with His creation.

Petrified. A quick stop at 7 Eleven to purchase a lottery ticket almost cost the author her life.  Once she was inside, three young Black males arrived to rob the store.  They held everyone hostage.  Instead of getting away quickly, all three paid the ultimate cost.

A Wishbone Christmas. A family is devastated when the father leaves with all their savings.  Already destitute with three children to support, the mother loses her job. Using their individual skills and abilities, the kids help save the home and the family.  After a horrible year, something the mother's grandmother once did sparked a series of events that make it the best Christmas ever.

Brian's Wish. A young boy with a good heart feels the need to help a new classmate who is homeless.  He befriends the girl and finds ways to support her.  With the assistance of his father, a pastor at the local church as well as the congregation, Brian makes his wish for Daisy and her family, come true.

How Much Will It Cost?

The total cost from pen to print is $25,000 USD

Forty stories have already been created and require professional editing with some rewrites followed by final polishing. Cost: $7,250

The collection will then go to a designer for interior layout, cover art, and creation of the print-ready files. Cost: $2,500

Publishing will occur through a company that offers both print and e-book creation and distribution.  The printer distributes through standard book distributors, so the Just Imagine Fiction series will immediately be available to independent bookstores as well as the largest chains like Barnes & Noble.  The same printer will distribute the electronic version through 12 of the major e-book carriers like Amazon, iTunes, Sony, Kobe and others.  Cost: $750

As soon as the print version is available, 500 copies will be ordered for use in the marketing campaign. Cost: $2,500

This funding initiative will also pay for a marketing campaign.  The author will utilize online publicity and social media combined with press releases that will reach traditional media outlets like newspapers, magazines, radio and TV. Cost: $6,000

Once the funding goal has been met, $6,000 will be earmarked for a writing course.  Although Barbara has already achieved much in her career, she will hone her writing skill so that future books in the Just Imagine Fiction series will not have to undergo extensive editing.

Other Ways To Help

  • Pray for the Just Imagine Fiction series! Today's youth need to hear God's word in an accessible and appealing format.  Barbara is dedicating herself full time to this mission.  Your prayers will help change our future.
  • Tack a link to this funding site to the top of your Facebook page until the end date of the funding initiative
  • Tweet about the importance of the Just Imagine Fiction series once a day.  Share your thoughts, passion and prayers for this project.
  • Send Barbara your story or witness about how God has helped youth in your area. This will ensure that the stories created for future books in the series touch on the issues affecting young adults today.

 Who Is The Author?

Barbara D. Culp, Ed.D., is an ward-winning author with a proven track record of three published books. Her lifelong passion has been to connect with young people through a series of short stories.

Even before Barbara began receiving regional and national recognition for her work, she was always a writer.  Deep in her heart lives a passion to bring joy to others via pen and paper.  Now that she has retired from thirty-two years of devoted service to Atlanta's schools, she is pursuing her mission full time.

She has been married to the love of her life for forty-five years.  Her two adult children have blessed her with five grandchildren and one great granddaughter.  The names of her children, grandchildren, and great-granddaughter have been used for the characters in many of her Christian fiction adventures.

story:
Who are Rigger, Mortiz and Shivver?

I created them a long time ago for an RPG APA (Amateur Press Association). While their names are puns, their concept stuck with me.

Now I'd like to launch them in a book on the Amazon Kindle platform. If the book takes off I'll make it into the first of a series.

Who am I? My name is Jeffrey Allan Boman. For over 20 years I've been a self-published author and also published for games. In 2009 I won an Aurora award for a fan magazine that I publish.

With the advent of electronic self-publishing there isn't a big publishing house as a stopgap - but the burden to produce a good product is still there on my head. 

Rigger, Mortiz and Shivver are a PI firm based in Boston who cater to the unusual. Tommy Shivver is in love with Yolanda Mortiz, but things are complicated: Tommy is dead and now a ghost. He can be seen, but not touched.

What follows is a mixture of mystery, supernatural shenanigans and dry humor.

Anatomy of the Project

Because I'm producing this by myself I have to purchase things that a publishing house would do.

One of these things is to purchase good cover art. The image that I'm using is better than I could draw, but I need something more dynamic. I have the artist (I'll reveal his name later on). He illustrates for a living. He'll cost me $500 alone.

I'll also need professional editing. I don't have the cost for that yet.

I'll make POD copies of the book for backers that get physical ones.

If I don't make my goal amount I'll buy my cover art, then get all that I can afford done.

Your Impact

As I said I'm hoping that this novel launches a series. I'm working on a mind map for it, and I've already found that there are many potential stories to come from the concept.

I want to get this story out; I don't want to wait for a big house to be interested in it enough to print it.

As I've said I have over 20 years of publishing experience. I've written fiction for more than 30 years too... so you   know that I'm not just a fly-by-night operator.

Other Ways You Can Help

Ok, so you don't have $5 to contribute. Unfortunate, but it is what it is. Please share this IndieGogo on ALL of your social media. Spread a buzz about it. Without the community's support the campaign won't be successful, much less the book.

Twitter, Facebook, Wordpress, Pinterest, Reddit, Tumblr... Heck, put it on your Xanga and Myspace if that's what you have. Help make my dream of a novel a reality.

story:
Who is River City UU?

River City Unitarian Universalist (UU) Church is a newly-formed UU Church in Little Rock, AR. We began meeting a little over a year ago, and quickly picked up momentum. We now meet two Sundays each month and have an average attendance of 20 people. 

  • Since we've begun, we've double our regular attendance. Aside from the regular 20, we have another 20 people who are actively participating via Google group and Facebook.
  • We are focused on living our Unitarian Universalist Principles not just within our walls, but also in the larger community. We were thrilled to participate in Little Rock's first-ever Pride Parade this year, and have taken up a missional project with Lucie's Place. Lucie's Place (www.luciesplace.org) is a nonprofit organization created to support homeless and displaced LBGTQ persons in central Arkansas. River City UU has made and donated over 30 overnight bags (toiletries, pajama pants, etc.) to support this important work. 
  • River City UU is made up of a wide variety of participants, some long-time UUs and some completely new to the Faith. We are proud to support a truly multigenerational community, with participants from four to five different generations present in worship and other activities. Whether age 5, 15, 25, or 55...all are welcome!

Because we have great hopes for our emerging congregation, and we know the importance of supported Lay Leadership and connection to our District and Region, we are asking for your help!

The Deets and the Perks

Here are the details:

  • We are seeking support to fund 3-4 people to attend the UUA Southern Region Fall Harvest Leadership Training, Nov. 8-10. This conference offers INCREDIBLE leadership training for lay leaders, about 15 hours per person of training over the weekend. Additionally, participants get to make connections with others across the Southern Region and participate in great worship experiences. (Info on the conference can be found here!)
  • Any additional funds will go to support future leadership development opportunities. We know this is a short campaign, and if we do not reach our goal we will send less people or look for another opportunity for training in the future.

Here are the perks (the fun part):

  • ANY donation of $10 or more will designate you as one of River City UU's Heroes of Lay Leadership. You will receive a certificate of designation. 
  • For a donation of $10, you receive the certificate and a chalice bookmark featuring the artwork of Jordan Lynn Gribble (see samples here!).
  • For a donation of $25 you receive the certificate and a set of Chalice Elements bookmarks featuring Jordan's artwork.
  • For a donation of $50 you receive the certificate and a set of 7 Principles Artwork  -prints, size 8x10 (see art here!).
  • For a donation of $100, you will receive the certificate, a set of Chalice Elements bookmarks, and your choice of 2 8x10 matted prints (take a look at Jordan's gallery here!).
  • In keeping with our rich UU history, all of the Hero levels are named after Unitarian Universalist leaders and historical figures.

Heroes Make a Difference

It is crucial to the health and vitality of a congregation to support leadership development. The UUA Southern Region offers amazing opportunities for leadership development.

  • Supporting lay leadership in an emerging congregation supports Unitarian Universalism and growth.
  • Growing leaders helps the congregation grow so that we can give back to our community, to the larger UU movement, to our Region, and to the UUA.
  • We have very few congregations in this area, and connection with other UUs is enlightening and joyful!

Other Ways You Can Help

This is a short Campaign, but we may have similar ones in the future. If you cannot help at this time:

  • We welcome words of encouragement, and ideas about how to learn and grow.
  • There may be another chance to help at a later date.
  • If you have any other resources you'd like to share (books, worship materials, etc.), please let us know!

Please share the Campaign with friends using the indiegogo share tools!

story:
No politician here! But in some way every American has felt the wrath of the job crisis. Day-after-day we scan countless articles and watch the latest developments hoping that things will get better without our efforts.

Inspiring Americans to create jobs.
story_txt: No politician here! But in some way every American has felt the wrath of the job crisis. Day-after-day we scan countless articles and watch the latest developments hoping that things will get better without our efforts.Inspiring Americans to create jobs.
